title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Critical Thinking and Practical Problem-Solving Skills for Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of elementary science curriculum and basic teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex scientific problems from multiple perspectives and derive solutions.
Learners can design science activities applicable to educational settings by integrating Problem-Based Learning (PBL) and the design thinking process.
Learners can demonstrate creative problem-solving strategies using visual-spatial thinking through experiential learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
